title: Among Us: How to Get Stars + Free Beans for Cosmetic Shop

steps.title: Launch Among Us.
steps.content: Launch Among Us . Among Us is available to play on Android and iOS, Windows, Nintendo Switch , PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 , Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S. Stars are a paid , premium currency. There's currently no other way to get Stars in Among Us legitimately. If someone claims you can get it for free, it's most likely a scam or a third-party mod.

steps.title: Visit the shop on your device.
steps.content: Visit the shop on your device. Open the main menu and navigate to the icon of the dollar sign. Select the Star icon to view Star bundles. If you use Steam, Epic Games, PlayStation, Xbox, or Switch, you can also purchase stars directly from their official store websitesâ€”just be sure to sign in with your Among Us account.

steps.title: Purchase a Star bundle.
steps.content: Purchase a Star bundle. Stars come in packs of 20, 30, 50, 110, and 300. The price will vary for each bundle. If you don't already have a payment method linked to your account, you'll be asked to add one. [1] X Research source 20 : $1.99 USD 30 : $2.99 USD 50 : $4.99 USD 110 : $9.99 USD 300 : $24.99 USD Once the payment is approved, your account will have the Stars. You can use Stars to purchase cosmetics in the shop.

steps.title: Play Among Us games to earn beans.
steps.content: Play Among Us games to earn beans. Beans are regular currency obtained from normal gameplay that can be used to buy items in the shop. [2] X Research source You can get beans with every match you complete, though the number you receive can vary based on the following: Completing tasks Guessing the imposter correctly Killing crewmates as an imposter Winning rounds as crewmate or imposter Level-up multiplier
